name: Beam Space: Planet Conqueror
description:
FEATURES:
- 16 Planets
- 5 ships
- 5 drones
- 4 weapon items(collect & combine!)
- No IAP
- Lasers
- Beams
- Missiles
- EMP
- BIG BOSS
- Warp
- Infinity Mode

ASSET INFORMATION:
